body_html:
@xuehanxiongsc Instead of writing your own bazel file, perhaps you can try using one of the existing tests. E.g.:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/compiler/aot/tests/BUILD#L118

So try something like this:

$ bazel test tensorflow/compiler/aot/tests:tfcompile_test

Can you report back what results you get from this? If there is a problem, I'm suspecting it's more likely to be a Mac vs. linux issue, rather than a CPU vs. GPU issue.

body:
@xuehanxiongsc Instead of writing your own bazel file, perhaps you can try using one of the existing tests.  E.g.:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/compiler/aot/tests/BUILD#L118

So try something like this:

$ bazel test tensorflow/compiler/aot/tests:tfcompile_test

Can you report back what results you get from this?  If there is a problem, I'm suspecting it's more likely to be a Mac vs. linux issue, rather than a CPU vs. GPU issue.
